FuncDef: This command specifies when system will issueBeforeExpmessage before a CRL expires. For example, withcertificate-expiration-warning 5, the system will issue aBeforeExpmessage 5 hours before a CRL expires. An optionalrepeat<repeat-hour> parameter will enable the system to repeat theBeforeExpmessage every hour until the CRL expires.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the amount of time before a CRL expires when system issues BeforeExp. Values-0 to 8760.
Specifies that the system will repeat BeforeExp every repeat-hour. Values-0 to 8760.
